title: Guided Meditation: Openhearted Presence (2020-08-05)
itunes:title: Guided Meditation: Openhearted Presence
description: Guided Meditation: Openhearted Presence (2020-08-05) - This meditation guides us to arouse mindfulness through attention to our senses, and to rest in that wakefulness with a receptive and tender presence.
